content: Hello! If you are fans of formalized formal grammars and want to have a look at my 500-lines-long proof (originally much longer) that context-free languages are closed under union, review my PR #13514 please!

Bump. I've reviewed #13514. The style looks good, and although I'm not well-versed in the subject, I've tried defining functions and proving lemmas using the API. I found it intuitive and relatively easy to use.
